title: Performance Modeling Architect - Technical lead
summary: Passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Dynamic, intelligent people and inspiring, innovative technologies are the norm here. We are looking for a highly motivated technical leader with hands-on experience who is passionate about performance engineering and performance modeling of sophisticated SoC features.You will be joining a team of extraordinary engineers and interacting daily with software and hardware engineering teams across Apple.
description: Technically lead areas of the performance architecture. Collaborate with Platform Architecture, Microarchitecture and core software teams to Lead, develop, model and analyze performance features in modern and sophisticated SoCs. Analyze workloads to identify performance bottlenecks and opportunities Perform self-guided performance simulation studies of architectural alternatives Write and maintain features, sections and tools of the architectural performance model Develop and implement C++ model and interface it to the different agent models and software simulation platforms Define and document performance targets and details of interesting and important use cases
preferred_qualifications:
Strong SoC architecture knowledge, micro-architecture knowledge, and an understanding of competing architectures
Experience working in a performance modeling environment
Strong knowledge and proficiency in software development in C/C++
Proficient in scripting languages such as Python
Ability to conduct experiments in all phases of design, gathering and analyzing data; and to utilize scripting/spreadsheet to document and present results
Knowledge and experience with common performance benchmarks and workloads
Experience technically leading small teams
